page.title: 01ACCRINGTON-REVIEW
page.content: The survey block we are looking at is the one which includes{Peel Park} (our School). The block has a lot of houses as Accrington is an industrial town. There is one main road in our block{- Burnley Road.} One of the first things you see when you look at our block is the cemetery where people are buried or cremated. The other big thing is the{Coppice}which is a large hill just a couple of minutes away from my school. it is a few hundred feet short of being a mountain. Next week a new{motorway}is being opened which has been cut through the Coppice. It runs for most of the way parallel to the{King's Highway}which is one of the area's ancient roads. It is hoped the new road will cut down traffic through the town centre. Christopher Cunliffe.
